text: Below is a list of notable footballers who have played for Steaua București. Generally, this means players that have played 100 or more Liga I matches for the club. However, some players who have played fewer matches are also included: this includes some players who did not reach the 100 games but made significant contributions to the club's history and performances. Numbers below indicate national championship appearances for Steaua. ==Key to positions== {|class="wikitable" |- !GK |Goalkeeper !RB |Right back !RW |Right winger !DF |Defender |- !IF |Inside forward !LB |Left back !LW |Left winger !CB |Centre back |- !FW |Forward !FB |Full back !W |Winger !MF |Midfielder |- !ST |Striker !WH |Wing half !AM |Attacking midfielder !CM |Central midfielder |} ==Notable players== Appearances and goals adds from Steaua's official book. 1955.jpg|Alexandru Apolzan, former captain of Steaua's Golden Team in the 1950s File:Ion Voinescu.jpg|Ion Voinescu, former goalkeeper of Steaua in the 1950s File:Nicolae Tătaru 1955.jpg|Nicolae Tătaru, former striker of Steaua played for the club from 1953 to 1964. File:Gheorghe-constantin vintage.jpg|Gheorghe Constantin, former striker and captain of Steaua in the '50s-'60s File:Iosif Petschovschi (1952).jpg|Iosif Petschovschi, former midfielder of Steaua in the 1950s. File:Anghel Iordănescu.jpg|Anghel Iordănescu, is the highest goalscorer in the history of club. File:Ion Dumitru.jpg|Ion Dumitru, former captain of Steaua. File:Marcel Raducanu.JPG|Marcel Răducanu, former midfielder of Steaua . File:Tudorel Stoica.jpg|Tudorel Stoica, the most capped player in the history of the club. File:Belodedici.JPG|Miodrag Belodedici, former captain of Steaua. File:Ion Vladoiu.jpg|Ion Vlădoiu, former top scorer of Steaua. File:Dan Petrescu.jpg|Dan Petrescu, former captain of Steaua in 1991. File:Ilie Dumitrescu.jpg|Ilie Dumitrescu, former captain and top scorer of Steaua. File:Paraschiv ritaglio.jpg|Sorin Paraschiv, former Steaua player, played 8 years at Steaua. File:Mihai Nesu.jpg|Mihai Neșu, former Steaua left back. File:Sorin Ghionea.PNG|Sorin Ghionea, former captain of Steaua. File:Ogararu2.jpg|George Ogăraru, former Steaua player, played 10 years at Steaua. File:Mirel Rădoi.jpg|Mirel Rădoi, former captain of Steaua, played 9 years at Steaua.
